title: Stealing Amy
description: They grabbed the wrong girl. They thought I was his wife, not the woman he’s obsessed with.Ivan Romanov is one of the Russian mafia’s biggest financial backers.And he’s been destroying my life piece by piece just to get me in his bed.I never wanted to be in this situation.Stalked.Cornered.Desperate.I was doomed. About to be forced by a powerful man who was willing to take what I didn’t want to give.Then he came, a demon in the dark. A dark voice that told me to be a good girl if I want to live…Stealing Amy is a standalone dark romance in the Disciples series.
author: Izzy Sweet
